direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve querying margin-related data, specifically focusing on inventory and capital flow.
Both methods access and query margin-related assets, though for different purposes (inventory vs. liability).
Both methods involve querying the state of the margin account, though for different aspects (inventory vs. overall account details).

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for querying available inventory.
Setting up the environment is necessary before querying margin inventory.
Verifying the inventory after querying helps ensure the data is accurate and complete.
